abstract: bears missing 3 safeties vs. 49ers ; prosinski , hall available to start .
article: by chris emma -- . chicago -- the bears will be starting somebody at safety sunday who was n't active on the roster last week as the injuries pile up in the secondary . chris prosinski , who was signed last thursday , or deiondre ' hall , activated from injured reserve saturday , will start at safety alongside rookie eddie jackson . the bears are missing defensive backs adrian amos , deon bush and deandre houston-carson , all ruled inactive against the 49ers . the team declined to name a starter . the bears ' other inactives include cornerback bryce callahan , offensive lineman hroniss grasu , running back taquan mizzell and quarterback mark sanchez .

linebacker danny trevathan will play for the first time in a month after missing three games with a calf strain . guard josh sitton is also active after being cleared from the concussion protocol during the week . kickoff between the bears and 49ers comes at noon sunday from soldier field . chris emma covers the bears , chicago 's sports scene and more for cbschicago . com . follow him on twitter @cemma670 and like his facebook page .
